definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: He is an impartial and incorruptible judge.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名鐵面無私的法官。

sentences.english: He is a impartial and incorruptible judge.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名鐵面無私的法官。

sentences.english: He's an impartial and perspicacious judge.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名鐵面無私的法官。

sentences.english: He is a impartial and incorruptible law-officer. judge.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名鐵面無私的法官。

definition: to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
to gang up for personal interest (idiom)/to form a clique
to uphold virtue and condemn evil (idiom)
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
